00234 template <class Base>
00235 bool TLoggerWrap<Base>::SendInfoMessageOnce(
00236                      int id,
00237                      const QString& message,
00238                      const QString& messageSource,
00239                      int flags) const
00240 {
00241        if (!m_onceMessageIds.contains(id)){
00242               m_onceMessageIds.insert(id);
00243 
00244               return SendInfoMessage(id, message, messageSource, flags);
00245        }
00246 
00247        return false;
00248 }

00304 // reimplemented (istd::ILogger)
00305 
00306 template <class Base>
00307 bool TLoggerWrap<Base>::IsLogConsumed(
00308                      const istd::IInformationProvider::InformationCategory* /*categoryPtr*/,
00309                      const int* /*flagsPtr*/) const
00310 {
00311        return (m_logPtr != NULL);
00312 }
00313 
00314 
00315 template <class Base>
00316 bool TLoggerWrap<Base>::SendLogMessage(
00317                      istd::IInformationProvider::InformationCategory category,
00318                      int id,
00319                      const QString& message,
00320                      const QString& messageSource,
00321                      int flags) const
00322 {
00323        if (m_logPtr != NULL){
00324               QString correctedMessage = message;
00325               QString correctedMessageSource = messageSource;
00326 
00327               DecorateMessage(category, id, flags, correctedMessage, correctedMessageSource);
00328 
00329               m_logPtr->AddMessage(istd::TSmartPtr<const istd::IInformationProvider>(new ilog::CMessage(category, id, correctedMessage, correctedMessageSource, flags)));
00330        
00331               return true;
00332        }
00333 
00334        return false;
00335 }
